tafsir: This verse opens the Surah by declaring the name of Allah, the Most Merciful, the Most Compassionate.
All praise is for Allah, the Lord and Sustainer of all worlds and creatures.
A repetition of Allah's attributes of mercy — the most general and the most specific forms of mercy.
He is the Sovereign of the Day of Judgment — the day of final accountability.
We worship You alone, and seek help only from You — total submission and reliance.
We ask You to guide us to the Straight Path — the path of righteousness.

text: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
tafsir: The path of those who received Your grace — not of those who earned anger, nor those who went astray.
